short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all your open tabs in a list. Search the list, go directly to a tab, or close it from here.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever had too many tabs open? Use UrThredz (Your Threads) to find, navigate to, or close any tab quickly. Just hit Ctrl-Shift-U (Command-Shift-U for Mac users) and use the type-ahead filter to find the tabs you were looking for.

Tag'n'Bag feature: clean up your open browser tabs by tagging them with keywords and closing them. Closed tabs will be remembered, and you can search through them just as easily as your open tabs.
